The claim states that there have been no: 19 deaths in Israel due to a baking soda remedy.
The World Health Organization: WHO) reports that Israel has recorded 305 deaths related to COVID-19 as of June 21, 2020, contradicting the claim.
Health experts: including Cristian Paredes and Olosmira Correa, have stated that there is no evidence to support the claim that a mixture of lemon and bicarbonate can prevent or cure COVID-19.
